columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DIET_MOD_CALORIES_C_NAME
columns.description: The diet calorie modifier category ID associated with the order record for this row.

columns.name: DIET_CALORIES_CMT
columns.description: The comment associated with the diet calorie modifier for this row.

columns.name: DIET_CAL_QST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the question record associated with this row.
